performance_metrics.name: Yield Rate
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of dough transformed into finished bread. Accounts for waste due to defects, breakage, and trim loss. Measured per batch.

performance_metrics.name: Specific Gravity (Initial)
performance_metrics.description: Initial density of dough, indicative of gluten development and hydration. Measured using a hydrometer.

performance_metrics.name: Specific Gravity (Final)
performance_metrics.description: Density of finished bread, correlated with moisture content and overall quality. Measured using a hydrometer.

performance_metrics.name: Crumb Volume (cm³/100g)
performance_metrics.description: The total volume of the crumb after baking, a key indicator of bread texture. Measured via displacement method or automated crumb analysis.

performance_metrics.name: Crumb Firmness (Shore A)
performance_metrics.description: Measures the resistance of the crumb to indentation, indicating texture. Measured using a Shore A durometer.

performance_metrics.name: Moisture Content (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of water in the final product, affecting shelf life and texture. Determined by oven drying and weighing.

performance_metrics.name: Shelf Life (Days)
performance_metrics.description: Time period over which the bread maintains acceptable quality (appearance, texture, flavor).  Dependent on storage conditions (temperature, humidity).

implementation_requirements.name: Dough Mixer
implementation_requirements.specifications: Multi-paddle mixer with capacity of 500-800 kg dough batches. Stainless steel construction. Variable speed control (100-800 rpm). Dough temperature monitoring and control system.
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures uniform mixing of ingredients and gluten development.

implementation_requirements.name: Bulk Fermentation Chamber
implementation_requirements.specifications: Temperature: 27-30°C, Humidity: 70-80%, Controlled airflow. Chamber volume: 100-150 cubic meters.
implementation_requirements.description: Controlled environment for initial dough fermentation.

implementation_requirements.name: Proofing Cabinet
implementation_requirements.specifications: Temperature: 30-32°C, Humidity: 80-85%, Continuous temperature and humidity control.
implementation_requirements.description: Final proofing stage, maximizing dough volume.

implementation_requirements.name: Deck Oven
implementation_requirements.specifications: Maximum baking temperature: 320°C, Baking time: 30-45 minutes, Consistent heat distribution, Digital temperature control (±2°C), Steam injection system (50-100 liters/hr)
implementation_requirements.description: Baking process, achieving desired crust color and crumb structure.

implementation_requirements.name: Cooling Conveyor
implementation_requirements.specifications: Stainless steel construction, Temperature control (20-30°C), Cooling rate: 1-2°C/minute.

implementation_requirements.name: Packaging System
implementation_requirements.specifications: Automatic bagging machine, Film selection for bread preservation (e.g., Modified Atmosphere Packaging - MAP)
implementation_requirements.description: Protects the finished bread from environmental factors.

industry_standards: HACCP (Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points)
BRC (British Retail Consortium) Food Safety Standards
operational_considerations: Raw Material Quality (Flour, Yeast, Water): Regular testing and traceability.
Process Control: Continuous monitoring of temperature, humidity, and dough hydration.
Sanitation: Strict adherence to cleaning and hygiene protocols.
Batch Size Optimization: Balancing production volume with dough handling efficiency.
Energy Efficiency: Implementing energy-saving measures in ovens and cooling systems.
Waste Management: Minimizing dough waste and optimizing packaging materials.
Staff Training: Regular training on baking techniques, quality control, and safety procedures.
